general.name: Muhammad Ibnu Ardhiansyah
general.headline: I'm a self-taught

about: Information Systems student leveraging web development and database administration skills to excel as a Backend Developer, Data Engineer, and Fullstack Developer. Proficient in various programming languages and databases. Highly curious, passionate about technology, and adept at solving complex problems innovatively.
